item.title: Repost from PunchTheLies https://twitter.com/PunchTheLies/statuses/976360350814793728/:
item.author: hello@roytang.net (Roy Tang)
item.description:
Repost from PunchTheLies https://twitter.com/PunchTheLies/statuses/976360350814793728/:

THREAD: #NaDuterte

March 19, 2018- In Cassablanca, my friend talked to a pinoy waiter from a catering who’ve served our dinner.

Friend(not a pinoy): hi kabayan, how are you doing? (kabayan is often used by foreigners when they greet pinoys)

Waiter: i’m fine sir, thanks
